# Contributing to the Subnautica Mod Template

Thank you for your interest in improving this template! Contributions are welcome and appreciated.

## How to Contribute

- **Bug Reports & Feature Requests:**
  - Please use the [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/visolar6/Subnautica-Mod-Template/issues) page to report bugs or suggest new features.

- **Pull Requests:**
  - Fork the repository and create a new branch for your changes.
  - Make your edits, following the existing code style and conventions.
  - Add or update documentation as needed.
  - Submit a pull request with a clear description of your changes.

## Guidelines

- Keep the template clean and easy to understand for new modders.
- Follow the established directory and naming conventions.
- When adding new example files, include comments to explain their purpose.
- Test your changes to ensure they do not break the eject process or template usability.

## Getting Help

If you have questions about contributing, feel free to open a [new issue](https://github.com/visolar6/Subnautica-Mod-Template/issues/new) or reach out in the Subnautica modding community.
